<<<<<<< HEAD
A brothers gift containing an hundred precepts, instructing all sorts of people to a godly, honest, and morall life. Everinden, Humphrey.
[40] p.
Printed [by G. Eld] for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his hop at the signe of the Bible without Newgate, London : 1623.
"The epistle" signed: Humphrey Everinden. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
